title: Live Updates: Deadly Battles in Southern Lebanon as Israeli Troops Clash With Hezbollah
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel would retaliate against Iran after Tuesday’s missile attack. President Biden said he supported Israel’s right to defend itself but urged it not to target Iran’s nuclear sites.
summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel would retaliate against Iran after Tuesday’s missile attack. President Biden said he supported Israel’s right to defend itself but urged it not to target Iran’s nuclear sites.

title: Lebanon’s Government, Crippled by Years of Crises, Is Ill-Prepared for Escalation
content: Already crippled by years of economic decline, political paralysis and other crises, Lebanon has little but its own citizens’ grit to survive the Israel-Hezbollah conflict.
summary: Already crippled by years of economic decline, political paralysis and other crises, Lebanon has little but its own citizens’ grit to survive the Israel-Hezbollah conflict.

title: UK’s Conservatives Are Surprisingly Upbeat at Their Party Conference
content: At its annual convention in Birmingham, the party is energized by a leadership contest and seems largely undisturbed by broader questions over its electability.
summary: At its annual convention in Birmingham, the party is energized by a leadership contest and seems largely undisturbed by broader questions over its electability.

title: Putin Tries to Recruit More Soldiers, Encourage Bigger Families
content: President Vladimir Putin is throwing ever more resources at two interlocked priorities: recruiting more soldiers and encouraging bigger families.
summary: President Vladimir Putin is throwing ever more resources at two interlocked priorities: recruiting more soldiers and encouraging bigger families.

title: Catholics Meet to Chart Church’s Future, but Not Women Deacons
content: The ordination of female deacons is no longer on the agenda during a global assembly at the Vatican, but will be discussed separately.

title: Ukraine Withdraws From Vuhledar, Town Long Under Russian Attack
content: Vuhledar had been under assault for almost three years. Russian forces entered it after a furious battle, and Ukraine ordered troops to retreat.
summary: Vuhledar had been under assault for almost three years. Russian forces entered it after a furious battle, and Ukraine ordered troops to retreat.

title: 60 Dead After Boat Capsizes in Nigeria

title: Dozens of Migrants Die Off Djibouti After Smugglers Force Them to Swim

summary: Many others are missing after Yemeni operators instructed hundreds of African migrants on two boats near the Djibouti coast to get off and swim, the International Organization for Migration said.

title: Missing Out on Coldplay’s India Tickets, Some Fans Vented — Even to Police

title: Three Men Arrested After Explosions Near Israeli Embassy in Denmark

title: Dozens Feared Dead After Migrant Boat Sinks Off Canary Islands
